title: Pasek and Paul’s Dogfight Will Get London Concert Reunion
content: The original London cast of Dogfight, Pasek and Paul's 2012 musical based on the 1991 film of the same name, is to be reunited at the St James Theatre in a concert staging that will be given two performances Oct. 11. It originally ran in London at Southwark Playhouse in August and September…
